contents.title: Why web design
contents.subtitle: More customers, branding & efficiency
contents.text:
A website acts as your digital real estate on the internet, making your business easily discoverable and expanding your customer reach. It's designed to promote your business both administratively and commercially, adapting to your specific goals.

From automated quote requests to integrated CRM systems, your website streamlines customer interactions through forms, email, SMS, or WhatsApp. This digital presence is crucial - with 70% of businesses already online, potential customers are significantly more likely to choose businesses with a professional website.

contents.title: Pricing
contents.subtitle: Standard subscription
contents.text:
If you want an affordable website, you've come to the right place. Large agencies quickly charge more than €6,000 for developing a professional, business website – and that's often excluding high monthly costs!

With me, you only pay €69 excl. VAT or €64 per month if you choose an annual subscription, for a powerful, custom-made website that every professional needs, complete with all essential sections plus many features in between.

miscLink.textMisc: Need a different solution, such as a website with more features, a heavy web application, web shop, etc., get in touch for a custom quote.

contents.title: Example website
contents.subtitle: Example Sections & functionalities
contents.text: Below you'll find an overview of example sections and functionalities included with a subscription for a professional website. These components are essential for any business website and contribute to promoting your business and attracting customers. You can customize the sections and functionalities to perfectly match your needs.

items.title: 1. Introduction (Hero)
items.description: An introduction (or 'hero') is the first section visitors see when they open your website. It contains a brief description of your business and the services you offer.

items.title: 2. About us
items.description: In the about us section, you tell more about your company, its history, mission and vision, and the people who work there.

items.title: 3. Services
items.description: In the services section, you describe the services you offer, possibly with a price list and contact form.

items.title: 4. Gallery/Portfolio
items.description: In this section, you show projects you've done in the past, with photos, videos, and customer reviews.

items.title: 5. Pricing
items.description: In the pricing section, you show the prices of your services, possibly with discounts and promotions.

items.title: 6. Customer reviews
items.description: In the customer reviews section, you show reviews from your chosen customers who have used your services. You choose which ones to display.

items.title: 7. Contact form
items.description: In the contact form section, you'll find your contact details, such as your address, phone number, email address, and a contact form where users can ask questions and/or request quotes. You'll receive notifications by email and/or SMS.

items.title: 8. Footer
items.description: The footer is the bottom section of your website, where you place your contact details, company information, social media links, and more.

contents.title: Frequently Asked Questions
contents.subtitle: Questions & answers
contents.text: Below you'll find a list of frequently asked questions about web design and websites. If you have another question, don't hesitate to contact me.

items.title: What's the average price to have a website made?
items.description: The average price for having a website made varies greatly, depending on the project's complexity, the functionalities you need, and the web designer's experience. Fortunately, with me, you only pay €69 excl. VAT or €64 per month if you choose an annual subscription. It comes with many benefits, such as a free domain name, hosting, maintenance, and support.

items.title: Can I request a quote to have a website made?
items.description: Sure, but why? When you know that for a professional website, you only pay €69 excl. VAT or €64 per month if you opt for an annual subscription? So you already know the price. You can start a subscription immediately by contacting me and have your website online in about 5 days. Of course, you can also contact me for more information.

items.title: What are the startup costs?
items.description: If you choose an annual subscription, there are no startup costs. You only pay €64 per month excl. VAT. If you choose a monthly subscription, you pay a one-time setup fee of around €200 excl. VAT.

items.title: What is SEO?
items.description: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization. It's the process of improving the quality and quantity of website traffic to a website or web page from search engines. SEO focuses on unpaid results rather than direct traffic or paid traffic. This is something I implement as standard in my websites.

items.title: What is a domain name?
items.description: A domain name is a unique name used to identify an IP address on the internet. A domain name is an address through which people can find your website on the internet. I handle the domain name for you and cover the costs. You don't need to worry about this.

items.title: What is hosting?
items.description: Web hosting is a service that allows businesses and individuals to place their website or web page on the internet. A web host, or web hosting service provider, is a company that provides the technologies and services needed for the website or web page to be viewed on the internet. I handle the hosting for you and cover the costs. You don't need to worry about this.
